briefdescription.para: SVG image.
Raster image.
Invalid or unknown image type.
Format of source image.
Align to grid north.
Align to true north.
Method for syncing rotation to a map's North direction.
Enlarges image to fit frame while maintaining aspect ratio of picture.
Stretches image to fit frame, ignores aspect ratio.
Draws image at original size and clips any portion which falls outside frame.
Enlarges image to fit frame, then resizes frame to fit resultant image.
Sets size of frame to match original size of image without scaling.
Controls how pictures are scaled within the item's frame.
Mode used to align to North.
Offset for north arrow.
Height of the picture (in mm)
Image rotation.
Width of the picture (in mm)
Map that sets the rotation (or nullptr if this picture uses map independent rotation)
Absolute path to the image (may be also HTTP URL)
Constructor for QgsLayoutItemPicture, with the specified parent layout.
Called after all pending items have been restored from XML.

detaileddescription.para:
Items can use this method to run steps which must take place after all items have been restored to the layout, such as connecting to signals emitted by other items, which may not have existed in the layout at the time readXml() was called. E.g. a scalebar can use this to connect to its linked map item after restoration from XML.
readXml()

briefdescription.para: Returns the item's icon.
Returns the linked rotation map, if set.

detaileddescription.para:
An nullptr means map rotation is disabled. If this is set then the picture is rotated by the same amount as the specified map object.
setLinkedMap()

briefdescription.para: Returns the current picture mode (image format).
Returns the mode used to align the picture to a map's North.
Returns the offset added to the picture's rotation from a map's North.
Returns the picture's current anchor, which controls how it is placed within the picture item's frame.
Returns the path of the source image.

detaileddescription.para:
Data defined picture source may override this value. The path can either be a local path or a remote (http) path.
path for the source image
setPicturePath()

briefdescription.para: Returns the rotation used for drawing the picture within the item's frame, in degrees clockwise.
Returns the resize mode used for drawing the picture within the composer item's frame.
Sets the map object for rotation.

detaileddescription.para: If this is set then the picture will be rotated by the same amount as the specified map object. This is useful especially for syncing north arrows with a map item.

briefdescription.para: Sets the mode used to align the picture to a map's North.
Sets the offset added to the picture's rotation from a map's North.
Sets the picture's anchor point, which controls how it is placed within the picture item's frame.
Sets the source path of the image (may be svg or a raster format).

detaileddescription.para:
Data defined picture source may override this value. The path can either be a local path or a remote (http) path.
picturePath()

briefdescription.para: Sets the fill color used for parametrized SVG files.

simplesect.para: This setting only has an effect on parametrized SVG files, and is ignored for non-parametrized SVG files.

briefdescription.para: Sets the stroke color used for parametrized SVG files.

simplesect.para: This setting only has an effect on parametrized SVG files, and is ignored for non-parametrized SVG files.

briefdescription.para: Sets the stroke width (in layout units) used for parametrized SVG files.

simplesect.para: This setting only has an effect on parametrized SVG files, and is ignored for non-parametrized SVG files.

briefdescription.para: Returns the fill color used for parametrized SVG files.
Returns the stroke color used for parametrized SVG files.
Returns the stroke width (in layout units) used for parametrized SVG files.
Returns a new picture item for the specified layout.

detaileddescription.para: The caller takes responsibility for deleting the returned object.

briefdescription.para: Forces a recalculation of the picture's frame size.
Recalculates the source image (if using an expression for picture's source) and reloads and redraws the picture.

parameterdescription.para: expression context for evaluating data defined picture sources

briefdescription.para: Sets the picture rotation within the item bounds, in degrees clockwise.

detaileddescription.para:
This does not affect the item's frame, only the way the picture is drawn within the item.
pictureRotation()

briefdescription.para: Sets the resize mode used for drawing the picture within the item bounds.

parameterdescription.para: ResizeMode to use for image file

briefdescription.para: Is emitted on picture rotation change.
Applies any item-specific size constraint handling to a given targetSize in layout units.

detaileddescription.para:
Subclasses can override this method if they need to apply advanced logic regarding item sizes, which cannot be covered by setFixedSize() or setMinimumSize(). Item size constraints are applied after fixed, minimum and data defined size constraints.
setFixedSize()
setMinimumSize()

briefdescription.para: Draws the item's contents using the specified item render context.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the context's painter has been scaled so that painter units are pixels. Use the QgsRenderContext methods to convert from millimeters or other units to the painter's units.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QDomElement &element, const QDomDocument &document, const QgsReadWriteContext &context) override
memberdef.name: readPropertiesFromElement

briefdescription.para: Sets item state from a DOM element.

detaileddescription.para:
element
is the DOM element for the item
document
DOM document
context
read write context
Note that item subclasses should not rely on all other items being present in the layout at the time this method is called. Instead, any connections and links to other items must be made in the finalizeRestoreFromXml() method. E.g. when restoring a scalebar, the connection to the linked map's signals should be implemented in finalizeRestoreFromXml(), not readPropertiesFromElement().

briefdescription.para: Stores item state within an XML DOM element.

parameterdescription.para: is the DOM element to store the item's properties in

briefdescription.para: Calculates bounding rect for image such that aspect ratio is correct.
Calculates bounding rect for svg file (mSourcefile) such that aspect ratio is correct.
Returns part of a raster image which will be shown, given current picture anchor settings.
Loads a local picture for the item.
Loads an image file into the picture item and redraws the item.
Loads a remote picture for the item.
Returns size of current raster or svg picture.
A layout item subclass that displays SVG files or raster format images (jpg, png, ...).
